My Portfolio

Third Year in IT school, Cybersecurity.

I chose the international language for my website in a way to have more possibilities with compagnies. I'm a french person, fluent in english.

If you click on my git links to see my differents projects or internships, you will have the french versions, because my school is in France.

About me...



Just about to begin my third year in computer science. I am motivated by any kind of project. I obviously like IT but also design, photography and management. I like to create projects and I have a very good sense of priorities. I thrive in teamwork. My speciality is the CyberSecurity.

Science review



In 2021, the Dikè doctoral training program, carried out by the CTHDIP, declined in two stages the theme of the interbreeding of rights in French-speaking sub-Saharan Africa.
For this occasion I was able to be the photographer who created the cover page of this book.
"THE MIXING OF RIGHTS IN FRANCOPHONE SUB-SAHARAN AFRICA."
